review: I purchased two of these when they first came out and were at a discounted price but did not use mine until Christmas.  My brother who I purchased one for had a very easy setup but mine took three tries to get it to connect to my Wifi.  Once connected it works pretty good.  I do own a Roku and have to say that the Roku is smoother to use and has more channels.  I have the Fire stick in my bedroom and it serves the purpose.  I have watched movies from Amazon on it without any playback issues.  I like the fact that it is portable.
